thread.section_title: Hoselink Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hoselink | hoselink.com.au | 2 of 4
thread.title: George Nicholls

author: George Nicholls
title: George Nicholls
text:
After persisting with sub-standard hose fittings and hose reals for years, I finally decided to give hose link a crack.
I brought two of the 20m hose reals and fittings some months back and haven't looked back since. Just wish I hadn't wasted all that money over the years on sub-standard hose and fittings.
This has been one of the best investments I have made in the garden.
Well done hose link.
